0.1.name: wordpress/wp-slider-captcha
0.1.description: An anti-spam captcha using jQuery's UI slider. After the position of the slider is past 60% (default), it will enable the submit button. This will replace the input button specified as the submit button, if JavaScript is not enabled the button will show as expected.
